description:
Samuel O'Toole and Nick Spartan are bored out of their skulls one afternoon, just trying to figure something- anything- to do with themselves. Nick suggests going down to the corner and throwing change at the elderly. Samuel has a much better idea. So Nick follows him down to the basement and in no time Nick realizes this is a far more constructive past time. Before too long the two of them are rubbing, stroking, sucking and fucking the afternoon away.

Enjoy!
title: Change Of Pace
